data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FIZz9xFf6pwQ7kNvgFW9hZQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAjZ8a2Sbngq5V-MfKYrDosE_OgCqrysQuaXmKx8tra8Q&oe=669A4C37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XUF1om_DcpoQ7kNvgHZ4mt6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB4Z_YlmgIZy37fPFC_FdY5UiABaafp_artcPQ-Maf8yg&oe=669A59D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1R2o8_6dt8EQ7kNvgHLsu2i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCkC_6jhmT8aQAGDzL3WsMRNMGL2oC32jSzdYklNobN4w&oe=669A4509)
